casebody.data:
FULTON BANK, N.A.
v.
Paul A. SANDQUIST, Patricia A. Zwaan, Barry L. Spevak and Downey, Spevak & Associates, Ltd. Petition of: Barry L. Spevak and Downey, Spevak & Associates, Ltd. Fulton Bank, N.A., Petitioner
v.
Paul A. Sandquist, Patricia A. Zwaan, Barry L. Spevak and Downey, Spevak & Associates, Ltd., Respondents No. 732 MAL 2017
No. 763 MAL 2017 Supreme Court of Pennsylvania. April 3, 2018

ORDER

PER CURIAM .

AND NOW, this 3rd day of April, 2018, the Petition for Allowance of Appeal is DENIED.
